title: Warhammer: The Old World Battle Report – War in the Border Princes
description:
Get a taste for the World of Legend by watching the Warhammer: The Old World episode of Battle Report from Warhammer+ for FREE! There are also loads more Warhammer: The Old World-themed shows coming to Warhammer+ soon.

title: How to Paint Movement Trays - Bretonnian Battlefield & Ancient Khemri Desert
description:
In this video, we'll show you two different styles for painting your movement trays for Warhammer: The Old World – a muddy Bretonnian battlefield, and an ancient Khemri desert. Using just a few paints for each style, you can create some great-looking transportation for your undead hordes and knightly battlelines. 

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.
